outline:
1. to be angry, be vexed, be indignant, be wroth, be grieved, provoke to anger and wrath
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be vexed, be indignant
      2. to be angry
    2. (Piel) to provoke to anger
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to vex
      2. to vex, provoke to anger
kjv_def: be angry, be grieved, take indignation, provoke (to anger, unto wrath), have sorrow, vex, be wroth.
strongs_def: to trouble; by implication, to grieve, rage, be indignant
